item.title: Dropbox Sync
item.description: Manually triggers Editorial’s Dropbox sync action and calls the native `Bleep` notification sound when the sync has completed.

item.title: Define Selection
item.description: Retrieves the definition of the selected term using the native system dictionary, displays native definition dialog, and then speaks the term.

item.title: Share WorkFlow
item.description: Opens the system share sheet locally with the contents of the system clipboard, URL-encoded. Designed primarily to AirDrop Editorial Workflows between devices.

item.title: - List
item.description: Formats the selected text as an unordered (-) markdown list.

item.title: MD Link
item.description: Transforms the selected text into a markdown-formatted hyperlink using the contents of the clipboard.

item.title: Copy Schemed MD Document URL
item.description: Copies the url schemed bookmark url of the current file to the clipboard.

item.title: Bold Selection
item.description: Wraps the selected text with double (*) asterisks.

item.title: Search Drafts by Selected Tag
item.description: Opens a tag-filtered search by the current selection in Drafts via x-callback-url.

item.title: Set Tot Dot
item.description: Pick a Dot (1-7) in Tot Pocket to replace with the selected text. If no text is selected, the entire document will be passed.

item.title: Search Workflow Directory
item.description: Searches the Editorial Workflow Directory by the selected text in the in-app browser.

item.title: OPEN
item.description: Opens the selected URL in a new Safari tab. Best paired with a keyboard shortcut.

item.title: Tweetbot Selection
item.description:
Opens the selected text in Tweetbot for iOS’ compose window. Upon install, you’ll need to enter your own Twitter @ name as the `Account` variable in the Tweetbot action.
(Best used with a handy keyboard shortcut.)

item.title: Clear Clipboard
item.description: Clears the system clipboard by copying nothing.

item.title: URL to Markdown Link
item.description:
This action makes a link in Markdown from a selected URL.
The link’s text is the Title of the page fetched from the URL.
For example:
http://dobyfriday.com
Becomes:
[Do By Friday](http://dobyfriday.com)

item.title: View Not Done
item.description: Show only TaskPaper tasks that are not marked Done.

item.title: List URLs...
item.description: Shows a list of URLs in the current document. Selecting one of the URLs opens it in the browser panel.

item.title: New OmniFocus Project
item.description:
This Workflow accepts TaskPaper text with «placeholder» tokens and prompts for you to enter final values, then creates a project in OmniFocus 2.14 for iOS using those tokens.
For example, given this input:
- «project_name» @parallel(false) @due(«due») - This task needs to be done at least 1 week before «project_name» is due @due(«due» -1w) - This task needs to be done at least 2 days before «project_name» is due @due(«due» -2d)
You'll be prompted to enter values for «project_name» and «due». If you enter "Phonewave 1.2" and "next Thursday", it will create a new "Phonewave 1.2" project in OmniFocus that is due next Thursday, and has two tasks already filled with due dates of this Thursday and next Tuesday.

item.title: Share...
item.description: Shows the iOS share sheet with the selected text as input. If nothing is selected, the entire document is shared. In a Markdown document, the text can optionally be converted to HTML first.

item.title: Convert to PDF
item.description: Converts a Markdown or plain text document to PDF. The result is shown in a browser tab.

item.title: Lucky Link
item.description: Replaces the selected word(s) with a Markdown link, pointing to the first Google result. E.g. when you select "Markdown", it is replaced with "[Markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown)".
